nodes.documentation: Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO.
nodes.name: setCEO

nodes.documentation: Assigns a new address to act as the CFO. Only available to the current CEO.

nodes.documentation: Assigns a new address to act as the COO. Only available to the current CEO.

nodes.documentation: Modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS NOT paused
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: Modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS paused
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: Called by any "C-level" role to pause the contract.
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation:
Unpauses the smart contract. Can only be called by the CEO, since
  one reason we may pause the contract is when CFO or COO accounts are
  compromised.
nodes.name: unpause

@dev Set the address of the sibling contract that tracks metadata.
  CEO only.
nodes.name: setMetadataAddress

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct GunBase.Gun storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
Used to mark the smart contract as upgraded, in case there is a serious
  breaking bug. This method does nothing but keep track of the new contract and
  emit a message indicating that the new address is set. It's up to clients of this
  contract to update to the new contract address in that case. (This contract will
  be paused indefinitely if such an upgrade takes place.)
nodes.name: setNewAddress

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct GunBase.Gun storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation: Returns all the relevant information about a specific gun.
nodes.name: getGun

nodes.documentation:
Override unpause so it requires all external contract addresses
  to be set before contract can be unpaused. Also, we can't have
  newContractAddress set either, because then the contract was upgraded.
nodes.name: unpause

Used to mark the smart contract as upgraded, in case there is a serious
  breaking bug. This method does nothing but keep track of the new contract and
  emit a message indicating that the new address is set. It's up to clients of this

  be paused indefinitely if such an upgrade takes place.)
